channel.title: Methods on Dr. Masato KOBAYASHI - an astrophysicist, a star former
channel.description: Recent content in Methods on Dr. Masato KOBAYASHI - an astrophysicist, a star former

item.title: Observations
item.description: Observations are important tools for us to access information on physical conditions of various astronomical objects. Photons from the Universe have a wide frequency range, each of which traces different spatial/energy scales in the Universe. In addition, recent cosmic-ray and gravitational wave observations opened up a new research field “multi-messenger astronomy”.

item.title: Semi-analytic Theories
item.description: Semi-analytic theories are important tools to investigate various conditions in the Universe, while supercomputer simualtions require significant computing time and cannot cover a full range of possible conditions.

item.title: Supercomputer Simulations
item.description: Supercomputer simulations are powerful tools to investigate what happened in the past in the Universe and what is happening at far distance in the Universe.
